short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate gold prices based on weight and purity with real-time market data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gold Price Calculator

Easily find the value of your gold with real-time prices!

Key Features:

Live gold price
Calculate values for 10K, 14K, 18K, 20K, 22K, and 24K gold
Enter gold weights in grams
See your total value, average purity, and total weight
Saves your inputs so you can pick up where you left off
This extension uses a live price API and stores your data locally on your device. Your information is never shared.

Privacy: [Link to privacy policy]
